snippet.title: Never Mourn - Official Trailer
snippet.description: Never Mourn is an action third-person rogue-lite PvE game developed by Primal Seed. Players will become a powerful battle necromancer named Irea tasked with a quest to save a life. Using all her strength and creative ways to wield her weapon, she must command her army to emerge victorious. Unlock different perks, spells, and army bonuses thanks to the ‘Necromancy System’ adding a level of strategic dimension. Never Mourn is launching in Q1 2024 for PC with a demo available now as part of Steam Next Fest.
